languages.text: "Столкнуться с предтечей. Коснуться его. Вобрать его. Чтобы отражение стало отражаемым. Чтобы Осколок стали Номос. Так и только так его угроза будет искоренена навсегда".
"Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
languages.original_text: "Столкнуться с предтечей. Коснуться его. Вобрать его. Чтобы отражение стало отражаемым. Чтобы Осколок стали Номос. Так и только так его угроза будет искоренена навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Clashing with the forerunner. Touching it. Choosing it. So the reflection becomes the object reflected. So the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "Clashing with the forerunner. Touching it. Choosing it. So the reflection becomes the object reflected. So the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "Clashing with the forerunner. Touching it. Choosing it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "Clashing with the forerunner. Touching it. Choosing it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: « Affronter le précurseur. Le toucher. L'absorber. Afin que le reflet devienne l'objet reflété. Afin que l'Écharde devienne Nomos. Alors seulement, sa menace sera éradiquée définitivement. »
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."

traits.locale_text: « Affronter le précurseur. Le toucher. Le choisir. Afin que le reflet devienne l'objet reflété. Afin que l'Écharde devienne Nomos. Alors seulement, sa menace sera éradiquée définitivement. »
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: «Enfrentarnos al precursor. Tocarlo. Absorberlo. Conseguir que el reflejo se convierta en lo reflejado. Que el fragmento se convierta en Nomos. Entonces, y solo entonces, erradicaremos por completo su amenaza».
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."

traits.locale_text: «Enfrentarnos al precursor. Tocarlo. Elegirlo. Conseguir que el reflejo se convierta en lo reflejado. Que el fragmento se convierta en Nomos. Entonces, y solo entonces, erradicaremos por completo su amenaza».
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: “我们打算与先驱开战，触摸它，吸收它。这样一来，反射之物与被反射之物就会彼此调换，而星神碎片也会成为诺莫斯。这样，也只有这样，它的威胁才会根除。”
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."

traits.locale_text: “我们打算与先驱开战，触摸它，选择它。这样一来，反射之物与被反射之物就会彼此调换，而星神碎片也会成为诺莫斯。这样，也只有这样，它的威胁才会根除。”
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Kollidiert mit dem Vorläufer. Ihn berühren. Absorbiert ihn. Damit die Reflexion zum reflektierten Objekt wird. Damit das Fragment zu Nomos wird. Dann, und nur dann, ist seine Gefahr für immer ausgelöscht."
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."

traits.locale_text: "Mit dem Vorläufer zusammenstoßen. Ihn berühren. Ihn wählen. Damit die Reflexion zum reflektierten Objekt wird. Damit das Fragment zu Nomos wird. Dann, und nur dann, ist seine Gefahr für immer ausgelöscht."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: 「先駆者との衝突。それに触れること。それを吸収すること。鏡像が鏡像の対象となるかのごとく。シャードがノモスになるように。そうして初めて、その脅威は永遠に根絶されるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."

traits.locale_text: 「先駆者との衝突。それに触れること。それを吸収すること。鏡像が鏡像の対象となるかのごとく。シャードがノモスになるように。そうして初めて、その脅威は永遠に根絶されるのだ」
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Haberciyle çatış. Ona dokun. Onu özümse. Böylece yansıma, yansıyan hâline gelecek. Böylece Parça, Nomos hâline gelecek. Ancak o zaman bu felaketi ebediyen ortadan kaldırabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Clash with the precursor. Touch it. Absorb it. So that the reflection becomes the object reflected. So that the Shard becomes Nomos. Then, and only then, will its threat be eradicated forever."
